story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_0200: Red and Blue are battling Mewtwo!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_0300:
That’s enough, Mewtwo! Don’t you want some
rest? You can’t even control your own power!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_0500: Don’t worry, we’ll set you free!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_0600:
Looks like this won’t last much longer. We can
always depend on Red and Blue!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1000: What do you think you’re doing, Giovanni?
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1100: I won’t let you erase such magnificent power.
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1200:
What are you talking about?! Why draw out all
that power if you can’t even use it?
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1300: Your logic is sound. But not to worry.
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1400:
Mewtwo. Right now, you’re just aimlessly wasting
your power.
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1500:
You can’t control it by yourself...but I can help
you harness that power and finally be complete!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1600:
Allow me to give your power some purpose! We
share the same proclivity for malice, do we not?
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1700:
Join me, Mewtwo, to make the most notorious
sync pair there ever was!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_1900: What’s going on here? Don’t tell me—
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2000:
Heh. With this, I now possess the full power of
these sync stones.
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2100:
We’ve forged a strong bond, as we share the
same will.
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2200: Look at Mewtwo! It’s...listening to him!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2300:
So...this is the true power of bonds that Professor
Bellis was researching? And it doesn’t matter if the
bond is good or evil?
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2400:
I can’t believe you think such a twisted bond
would actually make you stronger!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2500:
We’re going to stop you now, together with our
partner Pokémon!
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2700:
Then allow me to prove our strength to you
once again.
story_teamrocket_01_24000/2401_1201_2800:
Witness Mewtwo’s true power—the power of our
shared penchant for evil!
